snippet: President Benigno S. Aquino III praised Mr. Roxas, his interior secretary, as the candidate most likely to carry on his anticorruption efforts.
abstract: Philippine Pres Benigno S Aquino III endorses Interior Sec Mar Roxas in 2016 presidential election.
lead_paragraph: President Benigno S. Aquino III praised Mr. Roxas, his interior secretary, as the candidate most likely to carry on his anticorruption efforts.

headline.main: Philippines’ President Endorses Mar Roxas as Successor
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Philippines: Aquino Backs Interior Chief
